benchmark_details.name: UIT-ViNames
benchmark_details.overview: This dataset comprises over 26,850 Vietnamese full names annotated with genders for the purpose of gender prediction based on names.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To build a dataset for analyzing Vietnamese names for gender prediction using machine learning models.

data.source: Collected from several universities in Vietnam covering a diverse range of names.
data.annotation: Annotated with genders: 1 for male and 0 for female.

methodology.calculation: Macro average scoring method to calculate F1-score.
methodology.interpretation: An F1-score of 96% indicates a high predictive performance on gender detection.
methodology.validation: Data was split into training, development, and test sets in a proportion of 70%, 10%, and 20% respectively.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The data only contains names and genders, avoiding revealing identities.
